channel.title: Private server help please :(
channel.description:
Well guys. Im using cheesescape source. And im following scottypipin's tut. He said you will get this when u use cheesescape
1)Click your Cheezscape source folder. Right click on "compile" and click edit. The notepad should look like this: Code: @echo off title CheezScape Compiler javac *.java pause Delete that and copy and paste this instead: Code: @echo off title CheezScape Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe" server pause Again, if you have Java update 6 probably change the 07 to 06. That should work. When you double click on it, it should come up with: Code: Starting Cheezscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 If it comes up with that then your done and it should be working. Any errors? post here or pm me. 2)After that EXIT compile and then click on runserver, if you get this: Code: Starting Cheezscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 It's all working and you can run your moparscape client, and log in!
Instead of starting cheezescape server i get The system file cannot be specified. The system file cannot be specified Press any key to continue.. If u guys cant help me out can u give me an easier source.. I tried testscape already but i cant make myself a moderator :( Edit:: I set the classpaths.. Im not sure what i use 06 07 or 08.. Can anyone tell me how i know what i have.. Please help =]

item.title: Private server help please :(
item.dc:creator: @MasterHelper MasterHelper
item.description:
@MasterHelper wrote:

:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::
::This Compiler is under no licenses and may::
::be distributed freely.::::::::::::::::::::::::::
:::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit

Read full topic

item.title: Private server help please :(
item.dc:creator: @Danny15 Danny15
item.description:
@Danny15 wrote:

Well guys. Im using cheesescape source. And im following scottypipin’s tut. He said you will get this when u use cheesescape

1)Click your Cheezscape source folder. Right click on "compile" and click edit. The notepad should look like this: Code:

@echo off
title CheezScape Compiler
javac *.java
pause

Delete that and copy and paste this instead:
Code:

@echo off
title CheezScape Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin/java.exe” server
pause

Again, if you have Java update 6 probably change the 07 to 06. That should work.
When you double click on it, it should come up with:
Code:

Starting Cheezscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

If it comes up with that then your done and it should be working. Any errors? post here or pm me.

2)After that EXIT compile and then click on runserver, if you get this:
Code:

Starting Cheezscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594

It’s all working and you can run your moparscape client, and log in!

Instead of starting cheezescape server i get

The system file cannot be specified.
The system file cannot be specified
Press any key to continue…

If u guys cant help me out can u give me an easier source… I tried testscape already but i cant make myself a moderator

Edit:: I set the classpaths… Im not sure what i use 06 07 or 08… Can anyone tell me how i know what i have… Please help =]

Read full topic
